mil7.5.4:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘vicchikassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.4:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, vicchiko nangulavudho nangulam ussapetva carati;
mil7.5.4:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena nanavudhena bhavitabbam, nanam ussapetva viharitabbam.
mil7.5.4:1.4: Idam, maharaja, vicchikassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
